channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 22:07 Alarm to the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kamyansky district- Novomoskovsky district- Dniprovsky district- Pavlograd district- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community and Nikopol Territorial Community
